<title level="1" pfs="">[Old Thrasher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1634)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 34

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Old Thrasher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1634)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 48</row>

**Perception** +16; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 140

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +20,
**Damage** 2d10+8 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+8 bludgeoning

**Death Roll** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) **Requirement** Old Thrasher must have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** Old Thrasher tucks its legs and rolls rapidly, twisting its victim. It makes a jaws Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll against the grabbed creature. If it hits, it also knocks the creature [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). If it fails, it releases the creature.

**Deep Breath**   Old Thrasher can hold its breath for about 4 hours.

**Into the Deep** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirement** Old Thrasher must have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** Old Thrasher [Swims](/Actions.aspx?ID=39), bringing its victim along with it.

**Thunderous Tail** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Old Thrasher makes up to three tail Strikes against different targets. Any target hit must succeed at a DC 25 Fortitude save (DC 30 on a critical hit) or be knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

</column>
name: Old Thrasher

text: Old Thrasher Recall Knowledge - Animal (Nature): DC 34 Unspecific Lore : DC 32 Specific Lore : DC 29 Old Thrasher Source Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 48 Perception +16; low-light vision Languages Skills Athletics +18, Stealth +16 Str +6 Dex +2 Con +4 Int -5 Wis +3 Cha -2 --- AC 26 Fort +18 Ref +16 Will +15 HP 140 --- Speed 20 feet, swim 25 feet Melee Single Action jaws +20, Damage 2d10+8 piercing plus Grab Melee Single Action tail +20 (Agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6+8 bludgeoning Death Roll Single Action (Attack) Requirement Old Thrasher must have a creature grabbed; Effect Old Thrasher tucks its legs and rolls rapidly, twisting its victim. It makes a jaws Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll against the grabbed creature. If it hits, it also knocks the creature prone. If it fails, it releases the creature. Deep Breath Old Thrasher can hold its breath for about 4 hours. Into the Deep Single Action Requirement Old Thrasher must have a creature grabbed; Effect Old Thrasher Swims, bringing its victim along with it. Thunderous Tail Two Actions Old Thrasher makes up to three tail Strikes against different targets. Any target hit must succeed at a DC 25 Fortitude save (DC 30 on a critical hit) or be knocked prone.
